title: Clear a Trademark for Use
description: A client wants to use a new name for a product. An IP attorney needs to conduct a full trademark search to assess the risk of infringement.

tasks.description: Search the USPTO database for identical and phonetically similar marks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs a federal trademark search.

tasks.description: Search state trademark databases and common law sources (e.g., web search, business directories) for unregistered uses of the mark.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent performs a more comprehensive search for other uses.

tasks.description: Analyze the search results to determine the likelihood of confusion with any existing marks.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent assesses the risk of a potential infringement claim.

tasks.description: Draft an opinion letter to the client summarizing the search results and providing a risk assessment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides clear legal advice on whether it is safe to use the proposed name.
